text: Upstream is a 1927 American comedy movie directed by John Ford and starring Nancy Nash, Earle Foxe, Raymond Hitchcock, Grant Withers, Sammy Cohen, Lydia Yeamans Titus, Emile Chautard, Jane Winton. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1927 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford
title: Upstream (movie)
